name: FarmDisaster
description:
You are a wild Fox, you gotta eat chickens to survive, be careful hunters and wild boars are after you, use WASD or the ARROW Keys to move.

The game still needs bug fixing in the hunter's movement and chickens, plus a lot of UI and animation improvements and the main menu, feel free to give feedback, this is my first Game Developed hope it satisfies your time spent.
